column2:
<!-- KNITR_ASIS_OUTPUT_TOKEN -->
<!-- rnb-source-begin  -->

```r
allDf %>%
  dplyr::select(index,sampleloc,virus.bin,OTU,Abundance) %>%
  filter(!is.na(virus.bin)) %>%
  group_by(index) %>% 
  mutate(N = sum(Abundance)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  filter(N >= 1045) %>%
  dplyr::select(index) %>%
  distinct() %>%
  .$index -> sinspu 

allDf %>%
  filter(index %in% sinspu) %>% # not interested in throat samples - no viral swabs
  dplyr::select(OTU,Abundance,index) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = OTU,
              values_from = Abundance,
              values_fn = mean) %>%
  column_to_rownames(.,var = \index\") -> sinspuDf

  .$index -> sinspu 

allDf %>%
